_PAGE_START_DESCRIPTION_:
Aloha-Vue is a powerful framework for Vue.js, designed to simplify development, enhance performance, and ensure accessibility. Includes:

  • Components: More than 50 ready-made solutions, such as buttons, modals, tables, tabs, spinners, and more.
  • Directives: Simple and effective tools for working with DOM, including safe rendering of HTML and event handling.
  • Functions: Utilities for data filtering, array handling, calculations, and more.
_PAGE_START_MAIN_ADVANTAGES_:
Main Advantages

  • Accessibility: All elements are designed to meet accessibility standards.
  • International Localization: Support for many languages, including Russian, English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Croatian, and Arabic.
  • Ease of Integration: Easy installation and flexibility in customization.
_PAGE_START_STRUCTURE_:
What's included in Aloha-Vue?

Components

  • AButton: Buttons.
  • ATable: Tables.
  • ATabs: Tabs.
  • AInput and ATextarea: Input fields.
  • ASpinner: Spinners and loading indicators.
  • And many more.

Directives

  • ASafeHtml: Safe rendering of HTML.
  • AOnHooks: Event handling during mounting and unmounting.

Functions

  • Filters: Formatting of text, numbers, dates, and currencies.
  • Utilities: Work with arrays, strings, and calculations, such as isOdd, isEven.
_PAGE_START_SUPPORT_:
Support

If you have any questions or suggestions, you can contact us via GitHub Issues or write to aloha.vue@gmail.com.
